output_list.reason: The mintToken function does not have a check on the overflow of the total supply, allowing the owner to mint an arbitrary large amount of tokens to an arbitrary user account, causing a depletion of the token's value.
The transfer function does not have a check on the overflow of the balance, allowing a user to transfer a large amount of tokens to an address, causing a depletion of the token's value.
The transferFrom function does not have a check on the overflow of the balance, allowing a user to transfer a large amount of tokens from an address, causing a depletion of the token's value.

The buy function does not have a check on the overflow of the buyer's balance, allowing a buyer to buy a large amount of tokens with an overflow of the buyer's balance, causing a depletion of the token's value.

The sell function does not have a check on the overflow of the seller's balance, allowing a seller to sell a large amount of tokens with an overflow of the seller's balance, causing a depletion of the token's value.
